Title: "Shelter in the Storm"

Tent homes, braved hearts, silence,
In each echo, Khan Younis thrives.
Courage whispers life.
prompt: ‘I keep asking myself how will I die?’ Gaza residents in fear as battle for Khan Younis escalates For Almaza Owda, in Gaza’s besieged second city of Khan Younis, thoughts have turned to how she might die.
